battle

Class SkillBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • battle.SkillBuilder

  • public class SkillBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs Skill objects using a builder pattern. All setter methods return the instance of the object it is called upon. The build method returns a new Skill object using the information obtained through defaults and set methods.
    Author:
    Andrew M. Teller(https://github.com/AndrewMiTe)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.time.Duration cooldown
      Stores the maxCooldown value for producing a Skill object.
      private boolean deathless
      When false this object will build the skill with a useCase that also checks to make sure the owner of the skill is not defeated.
      private java.lang.String description
      Stores the description value for producing a Skill object.
      private java.util.List<Status> effects
      Stores the effects value for producing a Skill object.
      private java.util.List<SkillHandler> listeners
      Stores the listeners value for producing a Skill object.
      private int maxTargets
      Stores the maximum targets value for producing a Skill object.
      private java.lang.String name
      Stores the name value for producing a Skill object.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> requirements
      Stores the requirements value for producing a Skill object.
      private boolean stunBreak
      When false this object will build the skill with a useCase that also checks to make sure the owner of the skill is not stunned.
      private java.util.List<Skill> subSkills
      Stores the subSkills value for producing a Skill object.
      private Target target
      Stores the target value for producing a Skill object.
      private java.util.function.Predicate<Skill> useCase
      Stores the use case value for producing a Skill object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SkillBuilder addEffect(Status effect)
      Adds a new Status object to apply to targets of this skill during successful execution.
      SkillBuilder addListener(SkillHandler listener)
      Adds a new SkillHandler object to receive method calls during appropriate events in the skill, such as successful skill execution.
      SkillBuilder addRequirement(java.lang.String requirement)
      Adds the name of a new Status object required to be owned by the targets of this skill in order for a successful execution.
      SkillBuilder addSubSkill(Skill subSkill)
      Adds a new Skill object required to execute successfully before this skill can apply its effects.
      Skill build()
      Creates a new Skill object built with the values set by this builder object.
      boolean removeEffect(Status effect)
      Removes an effect from the list of effects for producing a Skill object.
      boolean removeListener(SkillHandler listener)
      Removes a listener from the list of listeners for producing a Skill object.
      boolean removeRequirement(java.lang.String requirement)
      Removes a requirement from the list of requirements for producing a Skill object.
      boolean removeSubSkill(Skill subSkill)
      Removes a sub-skill from the list of sub-skills for producing a Skill object.
      SkillBuilder setAsPreBattleSkill()
      Sets this so that the skill built would qualify as a pre-battle skill.
      SkillBuilder setCooldown(java.time.Duration cooldown)
      Sets the amount of time remaining until the skill can be used directly after it is executed.
      SkillBuilder setDeathless(boolean deathless)
      This method allows you to set the skill to be built so that it is usable while the owner of the skill is defeated.
      SkillBuilder setDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Sets the description of the skill and how it is intended to interact with its target(s).
      SkillBuilder setMaxTargets(int maxTargets)
      Sets the maximum number of targeted Fighter objects that can be affected by this skills effects.
      SkillBuilder setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the skill to be built.
      SkillBuilder setStunBreak(boolean stunBreak)
      This method allows you to set the skill to be built so that it is usable while the owner of the skill is stunned.
      SkillBuilder setTarget(Target target)
      Sets the enumerated target value for determining valid Fighter objects this skill applies its effects to.
      SkillBuilder setUseCase(java.util.function.Predicate<Skill> useCase)
      Sets the case when the skill is usable.

        private boolean stunBreak
        When false this object will build the skill with a useCase that also checks to make sure the owner of the skill is not stunned.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SkillBuilder

        public SkillBuilder(java.lang.String name)
        Instantiates the object with the name of the Skill to be built.
        Parameters:
        name - see setName(java.lang.String). Cannot be null.

      • SkillBuilder

        public SkillBuilder(Skill skill)

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public Skill build()
        Creates a new Skill object built with the values set by this builder object. Default values for all parameters, if not explicitely set, are used with exception to the name parameter, which is set when the SkillBuilder is initiated.
        Returns:
        new Skill object built with properties set to this builder object.

      • setName

        public SkillBuilder setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the skill to be built. The name property has no default value.
        Parameters:
        name - name parameter for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setDescription

        public SkillBuilder setDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Sets the description of the skill and how it is intended to interact with its target(s). The default description is an empty string.
        Parameters:
        description - description parameter for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setTarget

        public SkillBuilder setTarget(Target target)
        Sets the enumerated target value for determining valid Fighter objects this skill applies its effects to. The default target is SELF.
        Parameters:
        target - target parameter for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setMaxTargets

        public SkillBuilder setMaxTargets(int maxTargets)
        Sets the maximum number of targeted Fighter objects that can be affected by this skills effects. The default maximum targets is 1.
        Parameters:
        maxTargets - maximum targets parameter for producing a Skill object. Cannot be <1.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setCooldown

        public SkillBuilder setCooldown(java.time.Duration cooldown)
        Sets the amount of time remaining until the skill can be used directly after it is executed. The default cooldown is 1 second.
        Parameters:
        cooldown - cooldown parameter for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null or ZERO.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setUseCase

        public SkillBuilder setUseCase(java.util.function.Predicate<Skill> useCase)
        Sets the case when the skill is usable. When its test method returns true, it allows the time remaining to decrement and for the skill to execute. The default use case returns true if the owner of the skill is neither stunned nor defeated.
        Parameters:
        useCase - usability parameter for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setStunBreak

        public SkillBuilder setStunBreak(boolean stunBreak)
        This method allows you to set the skill to be built so that it is usable while the owner of the skill is stunned.
        Parameters:
        stunBreak - true if the skill is unaffected by stuns.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setDeathless

        public SkillBuilder setDeathless(boolean deathless)
        This method allows you to set the skill to be built so that it is usable while the owner of the skill is defeated.
        Parameters:
        deathless - true is the skill is unaffected by defeat.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setAsPreBattleSkill

        public SkillBuilder setAsPreBattleSkill()
        Sets this so that the skill built would qualify as a pre-battle skill. (Cooldown is negative and the target is SELF.)
        Returns:
        this object.

      • addEffect

        public SkillBuilder addEffect(Status effect)
        Adds a new Status object to apply to targets of this skill during successful execution.
        Parameters:
        effect - new effect for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • removeEffect

        public boolean removeEffect(Status effect)
        Removes an effect from the list of effects for producing a Skill object.
        Parameters:
        effect - the object to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the object was successfully removed.
        See Also:
        addEffect(battle.Status)

        Parameters:
        requirement - new requirement for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        subSkill - new subSkill for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • removeSubSkill

        Removes a sub-skill from the list of sub-skills for producing a Skill object.
        Parameters:
        subSkill - the object to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the object was successfully removed.
        See Also:

        public SkillBuilder addListener(SkillHandler listener)
        Adds a new SkillHandler object to receive method calls during appropriate events in the skill, such as successful skill execution.
        Parameters:
        listener - new listener for producing a Skill object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this object.
